name: torrent
effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its water-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
short_effect: Strengthens water moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
